verses.verse: Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went on his journey, <S%H5375><s%> <S%H7272><s%> and came <S%H1980><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the people <S%H1121><s%> of the east. <S%H6924><s%>

And he looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a well <S%H875><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%> lying <S%H7257><s%> by <S%H5921><s%> it; for <S%H3588><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> well <S%H875><s%> they watered <S%H8248><s%> the flocks: <S%H5739><s%> and a great <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

And thither <S%H8033><s%> were all <S%H3605><s%> the flocks <S%H5739><s%> gathered: <S%H622><s%> and they rolled <S%H1556><s%> <S%H853><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and watered <S%H8248><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and put <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> again upon <S%H5921><s%> the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> in his place. <S%H4725><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, My brethren, <S%H251><s%> whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> be ye? <S%H859><s%> And they said, <S%H559><s%> Of Haran <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2771><s%> are we. <S%H587><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Know <S%H3045><s%> ye <S%H853><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nahor? <S%H5152><s%> And they said, <S%H559><s%> We know <S%H3045><s%> him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Is he well? <S%H7965><s%> And they said, <S%H559><s%> He is well: <S%H7965><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the sheep. <S%H6629><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Lo, <S%H2005><s%> it is yet <S%H5750><s%> high <S%H1419><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> is it time <S%H6256><s%> that the cattle <S%H4735><s%> should be gathered together: <S%H622><s%> water <S%H8248><s%> ye the sheep, <S%H6629><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> and feed <S%H7462><s%> them.

And they said, <S%H559><s%> We cannot, <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3201><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the flocks <S%H5739><s%> be gathered together, <S%H622><s%> and till they roll <S%H1556><s%> <S%H853><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth; <S%H6310><s%> then we water <S%H8248><s%> the sheep. <S%H6629><s%>

And while he yet <S%H5750><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them, Rachel <S%H7354><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> her father's <S%H1><s%> sheep: <S%H6629><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> kept <S%H7462><s%> them.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> that Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went near, <S%H5066><s%> and rolled <S%H1556><s%> <S%H853><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and watered <S%H8248><s%> <S%H853><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> brother. <S%H251><s%>
And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was her father's <S%H1><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> and that <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was Rebekah's <S%H7259><s%> son: <S%H1121><s%> and she ran <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> her father. <S%H1><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when Laban <S%H3837><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tidings <S%H8088><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his sister's <S%H269><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> that he ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him, and embraced <S%H2263><s%> him, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> him, and brought <S%H935><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> his house. <S%H1004><s%> And he told <S%H5608><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things. <S%H1697><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Surely <S%H389><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art my bone <S%H6106><s%> and my flesh. <S%H1320><s%> And he abode <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him the space <S%H3117><s%> of a month. <S%H2320><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art my brother, <S%H251><s%> shouldest thou therefore serve <S%H5647><s%> me for naught? <S%H2600><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me, what <S%H4100><s%> shall thy wages <S%H4909><s%> be?

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> daughters: <S%H1323><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the elder <S%H1419><s%> was Leah, <S%H3812><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the younger <S%H6996><s%> was Rachel. <S%H7354><s%>
Leah <S%H3812><s%> was tender <S%H7390><s%> eyed; <S%H5869><s%> but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> beautiful <S%H3303><s%> <S%H8389><s%> and well <S%H3303><s%> favored. <S%H4758><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> Rachel; <S%H7354><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> I will serve <S%H5647><s%> thee seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel <S%H7354><s%> thy younger <S%H6996><s%> daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> It is better <S%H2896><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> her to thee, than that I should give <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5414><s%> her to another <S%H312><s%> man: <S%H376><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel; <S%H7354><s%> and they seemed <S%H1961><s%> <S%H5869><s%> unto him but a few <S%H259><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> for the love <S%H160><s%> he had to her.

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Laban, <S%H3837><s%> Give <S%H3051><s%> me <S%H853><s%> my wife, <S%H802><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> my days <S%H3117><s%> are fulfilled, <S%H4390><s%> that I may go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of the place, <S%H4725><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> a feast. <S%H4960><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> that he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> her to <S%H413><s%> him; and he went in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> unto his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> <S%H853><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> his maid <S%H8198><s%> for a handmaid. <S%H8198><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> was Leah: <S%H3812><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Laban, <S%H3837><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2063><s%> thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> unto me? did not <S%H3808><s%> I serve <S%H5647><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee for Rachel? <S%H7354><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then hast thou beguiled <S%H7411><s%> me?

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> It must not <S%H3808><s%> be so <S%H3651><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> in our country, <S%H4725><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the younger <S%H6810><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the firstborn. <S%H1067><s%>

Fulfill <S%H4390><s%> her <S%H2063><s%> week, <S%H7620><s%> and we will give <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou shalt serve <S%H5647><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me yet <S%H5750><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> and fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> her <S%H2063><s%> week: <S%H7620><s%> and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him <S%H853><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%> also.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> <S%H853><s%> Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> his handmaid <S%H8198><s%> to be her maid. <S%H8198><s%>

And he went in <S%H935><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Rachel, <S%H7354><s%> and he loved <S%H157><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> more than Leah, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3812><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him yet <S%H5750><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

And when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> was hated, <S%H8130><s%> he opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> her womb: <S%H7358><s%> but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was barren. <S%H6135><s%>

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Reuben: <S%H7205><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> Surely <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath looked <S%H7200><s%> upon my affliction; <S%H6040><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore <S%H3588><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> will love <S%H157><s%> me.

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> was hated, <S%H8130><s%> he hath therefore given <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> son also: <S%H1571><s%> and she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Simeon. <S%H8095><s%>

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son; <S%H1121><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> this time <S%H6471><s%> will my husband <S%H376><s%> be joined <S%H3867><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, because <S%H3588><s%> I have born <S%H3205><s%> him three <S%H7969><s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> was his name <S%H8034><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Levi. <S%H3878><s%>

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son: <S%H1121><s%> and she said, <S%H559><s%> Now <S%H6471><s%> will I praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> she called <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Judah; <S%H3063><s%> and left <S%H5975><s%> bearing. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3205><s%>
